Container.Name: public-pool
Container.Overview: Run your own solo MINING POOL with web UI using public-pool & public-pool-ui. This Unraid template supports custom IP, ports, and direct Bitcoin node integration.
Container.DonateText: If you appreciate my work, then please consider buying me a beer :D

Config.Name: Stratum Port
Config.Description: Port for miners to connect (e.g. stratum+tcp://[IP]:3333)

Config.Name: API Port
Config.Description: (default: 3334); Public-Pool API port. Change only if you know what you are doing.

Config.Name: AppData Path (persistent data)
Config.Description: Directory where Public Pool stores shares, stats and worker data.

Config.Name: Bitcoin RPC URL
Config.Description: RPC URL of your Bitcoin node (e.g. http://192.168.1.100)

Config.Name: Bitcoin RPC Port
Config.Description: RPC port of your Bitcoin node (default: 8332)

Config.Name: Bitcoin ZMQ Host
Config.Description: ZMQ address of your Bitcoin node (e.g. tcp://192.168.1.100:28334)

Config.Name: Pool Identifier
Config.Description: Custom name for your pool (e.g. Home-Pool, Unraid-Pool)

Config.Name: Bitcoin Network
Config.Description: Bitcoin network to use (mainnet or testnet)

Config.Name: Enable HTTPS for API
Config.Description: Set to 'true' to enable HTTPS. Default is 'false' (HTTP only). Enable only if you have a proper reverse proxy or certificate setup.; Only enable HTTPS if you know what youâ€™re doing.
